attributes.action: To initiate negotiations with the Jamaican Government to free the world boss.
attributes.additional_details: It is not necessary to discuss releasing him permemantly, although, considering the love and admiration his fans have for him a ‘farewell’ concert would be appreciated.
attributes.background: Adidja Azim Palmer was sentenced to a life serving in jail on the 3rd April 2014. Palmer ‘Vybz Kartel’ has influenced many musicians globally through his music that spreads urban Jamaican culture with Jamaicans and non-Jamaicans worldwide. It’s tragic that non of us will be able to enjoy a concert.

rejection.details: This is the responsibility of the authorities in Jamaica.
